nodes.text: Sean Llewellyn Williams (born May 23, 1967) is an Australian author, writer of The Force Unleashed novel and co-writer of three New Jedi Order novels with Shane Dix. Prior to the reorganization of canon under The Walt Disney Company, Sean Williams and Shane Dix had expressed an interest in writing more Star Wars novels either set in the Unknown Regions or set between Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith and Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. At one time, Williams was tapped to write a new Star Wars novel that would have been a tie-in to Star Wars: The Old Republic, featuring a walk-on role for anybody to raise funds for a wildfire around Melbourne, Australia.[source?]
